meanings.definition: A group of things of the same kind that are held or tied together
meanings.sent1: The farmer picked a bunching of carrots from the garden.
meanings.sent2: She carried a bunching of flowers to decorate the room.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they tried to balance a bunching of apples on their heads.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like a bunching of diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons created a cheerful bunching in the sky.

meanings.definition: To form a group or cluster
